title: New gamemode Idea: Baron Ball!
body:
Or if you really really want it, 

Rules of Baron ball.

Two Teams
Vile Maw's Trotters vs Dragon's Ballers  :D 
Map: Crystal Scar
5v5
Goal:  Retrieve Baron ball from the middle of the arena, score the ball in enemy's goal to get a points.
Running in the ball, gives your team 3 points, throwing the ball in gives your team 1 point. Throwing the ball to a teammate in the goal gives you 2 points.
Killing: Encouraged
Score to: undecided

If you die, the killer gets the ball.

The Game adds in two new summoners. 

BB Throw High and BB Fast Ball

BBTH throws the ball high allowing it to pass over walls for a short distance. Teammates and enemies will automatically pick up the ball.

BBFB Throws the ball at a range of 3000 units after a brief channel. If it makes contact with players they will automatically pick it up with a brief knockback. If it makes contact with terrain it will stop instantly were it hit. 

Spice of Life:
Speed shrines have a chance to reduce your speed.
THE BUSHES ARE FIRE!: Staying in a bush for too long will send it a blaze for 15 seconds.
Baron Goo: Holding on to the ball for too long will give you sticky fingers.
Anomaly: I have no clue what it is, maybe you guys do or Riot. 

If the Baron Ball hasn't made player contact when removed from the central post from 10 seconds, it will reset.


Rewards
Traditional icons winning a couple of time medals 1, 2 and 3.
MVP: Team Icon
Playing a game without letting anyone on the enemy team score a goal. Baron Ball Icon

If Riot were to be generous enough, I want to do something special for the Boss Icons.

If you have the Icon for that Boss when you get their buff your champion will get a team shirt placed on their champion. Sort of hovering just outside of their hitbox around them. 

Maybe even release skins for different teams?
Syndra with a Dragon's Ballers skin, Sion with a Vilemaw's Trotters skin and releasing another Dunk Master skin. Probably for Vi?


Welp, that's Baron Ball. I hope Riot takes it up and we all to be playing it soon.
